transcripts.text: IT'S POP TRICKER TIME.  YEAH.
I'M SO EXCITED TO INTRODUCE OUR GUEST TODAY.  YOU GUYS, NOT ONLY IS HE AN INCREDIBLE HEAVYWEIGHT BOXER, BUT ALSO A HUGE ANTI-BOWLING ADVOCATE.
DAVID NINO-RODRIGUEZ IS HERE.

Of course, we've got Brett and we've got Grace.  So, David, I've been so excited to have you here on the show.  First of all, what I know of you as a heavyweight champion, six belts, and your record, 36 and...
36 and two, 34 knockouts, but... 34 knockouts.  I CONTRIBUTE THE TWO LOSSES AFTER THE INCIDENT.  THAT HAPPENED TO ME.  WHICH WE WILL TALK ABOUT.
BEFORE THE INCIDENT YOU WERE 34-0.
I WAS 36-0, 34 KNOCKOUTS.  THAT IS INSANE.  I WAS RIDING THAT HIGH HORSE AND EVERYTHING WAS UNBELIEVABLE.
FIFTH IN THE WORLD, AND A LOT OF PEOPLE HAD YOU PINNED AS THE NEXT HEAVYWEIGHT CHAMPION OF THE WORLD.
YEAH, THEY WERE CALLING ME THE CLITCH GO KILLER.  I WAS RIGHT IN LINE TO DO SOME BIG, BIG THINGS, AND DUE TO SOME UNFORTUNATE CIRCUMSTANCES THINGS HAPPENED, AND I WAS ALMOST MURDERED.

LET'S TALK ABOUT THE INCIDENT.  GET THAT OUT OF THE WAY.  BUT THIS IS THE, AND AGAIN, LIKE I TALKED TO YOU ABOUT EARLIER, NOT TO SOUND INSENSITIVE, BUT THIS INCIDENT BECAME LIKE THE SILVER LINING OF YOU BECOMING THIS BIG ACTIVIST.

IT WAS A BLESSING IN DISGUISE.  BECAUSE WHAT HAPPENED WAS?  I TOOK THE MOST POSITIVE.  I COULD OUT OF IT.  WHAT HAPPENED WAS?  I WAS CUT IN THE THROAT IN PHOENIX, WALKING OUT OF A BAR.  I WAS INTOXICATED, SO WERE SOME OF MY FRIENDS.  I DON'T REMEMBER THE WHOLE THING, TO BE HONEST WITH YOU.  I REMEMBER THAT.  WE STARTED THROWING WORDS BACK AT EACH OTHER, AND AS I WAS LEAVING, THEY CAME BEHIND ME AND SLIPPED MY THROAT OPEN.  THEY ALSO STABBED MY FRIEND.  BOTH OF US ARE LAYING THERE.  I'M GASPING FOR AIR DYING.  I'M LOSING SO MUCH BLOOD.  I LOST CLOSE TO TWO PINES.  I WAS IN A COMA FOR TWO DAYS.  WHEN I WOKE UP, I HAD 369 STITCHES.  I WAS LUCKY BECAUSE A COSMETIC SURGEON WAS ON CALL THAT NIGHT.  THAT DID THIS, OTHERWISE IT WOULD PROBABLY LOOK MUCH WORSE.  IT REALLY PUT A HUGE ROLE BLOCK IN MY CAREER.  I TRIED TO COME BACK TOO FAST, I FOUGHT DARNELL WILSON ON NBC AND I GOT LOST.  I WAS WINNING THE FIGHT AND I GOT KNOCKED OUT THE LAST 10 SECONDS.  EVERYTHING WAS JUST A MESS FOR ME.  THAT IS WHAT REALLY CATAPULTED ME INTO THIS PROGRAM.  MY FRIEND SAW ME IN EL PASO, I WAS DEPRESSED.  I COULDN'T BELIEVE ALL OF THIS HAPPENED TO ME.  IT HAPPENED SO QUICK.  I WAS WAY UP HERE, CLOUD NINE, AND THEN ALL OF A SUDDEN.  IT CAME CRASHING DOWN AND IT WAS ALL OVER FOR ME.  This guy named Sal kept coming up to me and saying, hey man, I want you to help me out with the kids, these kids, these kids.  Kept talking about kids.  I'm like, dude, I'm in no position to talk to any kids.  Nobody wants to hear from me.  I was so down and out, seriously.  Yeah.  Well, turned out that I started, he bugged me.  He was bugging me every day.  I was like, what is with this dude?  He was a thorn in your side.  Yeah, I was like, what is with this guy?  The kids, the kids.  He's all, come on, man, just come talk to the kids.  It'll make you feel better.  I'm like, I don't want to feel better.  I was just that bad.  AND HE GOES, WHAT DO YOU WANT TO TALK ABOUT?  HOW ABOUT BULLYING?  BECAUSE I WAS BULLIED AS A KID.
YOU WERE BULLIED AS A KID, WOW.

WE WENT AND WE PUT TOGETHER A LITTLE PRESENTATION.  IT TOOK ABOUT, I CAN'T BELIEVE HOW QUICK, IT FORMED ORGANICALLY AND IT REALLY TOOK OFF.  AND THE NEXT THING YOU KNOW, HERE I AM TALKING TO KIDS IN DETENTION HOMES, ALTERNATIVE SCHOOLS, MIDDLE SCHOOLS.  ONE TIME IT WAS LIKE 2,500 KIDS.  AND I'M TALKING TO THEM AND I'M THINKING TO MYSELF, MAN, THIS IS ALL HAPPENING REALLY FAST.  NOW, HERE I AM, THIS ADVOCATE FOR ANTI-BULLYING.  ALL I AM DOING IS SHARING MY STORIES.
WHAT IS YOUR STORY?  I KNOW YOU WORK CLOSELY WITH LUCIDLOVE.ORG, AND YOU ARE A KEYNOTE SPEAKER NOW, AND A LOT OF KIDS ARE LOOKING UP TO YOU AND RELATING TO YOU.

IT HAS TAKEN OFF LIKE WILDFIRE.  I DON'T TRY TO LECTURE THE KIDS OR TELL THEM ANYTHING.  I GO AND MAKE MY PRESENCE KNOWN.  I TELL THEM MY HUMILIATING STORIES ABOUT ME BEING BULLIED AS A KID.  IT IS A PRESENTATION ABOUT AN HOUR AND 15 MINUTES.  I TALK ABOUT HOW I USED TO EAT MY LUNCH IN THE STALL IN THE GYMNASIUM BECAUSE I WAS SO SCARED I WOULD GET MY BUTT KICKED EVERY DAY AT LUNCH.  I WAS SO TRAUMATIZED.  I USED TO HAVE TO EAT MY LUNCH IN THE STALL BECAUSE I WAS SO PETRIFIED.  I WAS SCARED TO GO OUTSIDE BECAUSE ALL THESE KIDS WANTED TO KICK MY BUTT.  I DON'T KNOW WHY.  THEY STILL DO.  I TALK ABOUT HOW THE PRINCIPAL WOULD CURSE ME OUT, YELL AT ME, TELL ME I'M NEVER GOING TO MOUNT ANYTHING.  I WILL NEVER FORGET WHEN I WON MY FIRST CHAMPIONSHIP IN EL PASO, HE WAS FRONT ROW, AND HE WAS LIKE, CAN I GET YOUR AUTOGRAPH?  I WAS LIKE, WOW, HOW SWEET IT IS.
YOU HAVE THIS REALLY UPLIFTING MESSAGE FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE BEING BULLIED, BUT WHAT WOULD YOU SAY TO THE KIDS?  WHO BULLY?

IT'S A VICIOUS CYCLE.  WHAT I'M DISCOVERING IS THAT I AM LEARNING ON THE JOB, BUT I AM DISCOVERING THAT SOMETHING IS GOING WRONG AT HOME.  IT IS A CYCLE.  KIDS CAN BE MEAN.  THAT IS THE NATURE OF THE WAY THINGS ARE.  IT IS A PECKING ORDER.  EVEN WHEN I WAS BEING BULLIED, I TOOK IT OUT ON OTHER KIDS TOO.  I WAS BULLIED TOO.  I AM NOT SAYING I WAS A SAINT.
THAT IS THE VICIOUS CYCLE.
IT IS INSECURITY.  IT COMES FROM A REALLY DEEP LEVEL OF INSECURITY.
THEY ARE MIRRING.  WHAT IS HAPPENING TO THEM AT HOME OR ON THE PLAYGROUND.  EVEN MIKE TYSON TALKED ABOUT THAT.  I JUST WATCHED CHAMPS THE OTHER NIGHT AND HE TALKS ABOUT ALL OF THAT, IT IS INSANE.
WHAT KIND OF FEEDBACK HAVE YOU GOTTEN SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN GOING OUT AND GIVING THESE TALKS?

I JUST GOT A CALL ON MY WAY HERE.  RIGHT NOW, WHEN I GET BACK TO EL PASO, I AM BOOKED FOR FOUR SCHOOLS ALREADY.  IT IS JUST TAKING OFF.  WE ARE NOT GOING UP THERE AND LECTURING, WE ARE SIMPATHIZING.  WE ARE REALLY TALKING TO THE KIDS.  WHAT TOUCHED ME, THIS IS THE ONE THAT GOT ME THE MOST, THERE IS A KID NAMED JAMES.  THAT I COULD TELL WHEN I WAS LEAVING MY PRESENTATION, HE WAS LOOKING AT ME LIKE A LITTLE KID.  THE PROGRAM DIRECTORS WERE TELLING ME THAT HE IS ALWAYS THERE AT THE REC AND HE NEVER LIKES TO GO HOME.  HE WAS PROBABLY EIGHT YEARS OLD.  AFTER MY PRESENTATION I GAVE IT AND IT ENDED, HE COMES RUNNING UP TO ME FROM HIS SEAT AND JUST HUGS ME AND JUST STARTS CRYING.  HE IS BALLING ON MY SHIRT AND I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT TO DO.  I WAS LOOKING AROUND.  I REALLY STRUCK A NERVE WITH HIM AND THAT WAS VERY REWARDING TO ME.  AND WHAT I'M TRYING TO DO?  RIGHT NOW, WE JUST GOT A RELEASE SIGN THAT WHENEVER I'M IN EL PASO I CAN GO DOWN THERE AND TAKE HIM TO BASEBALL GAMES OR TAKE HIM TO THE PARK OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT.  SO I'M GOING TO REALLY TRY TO HELP THE KID OUT.

AND AT THE END OF THE DAY, JUST HIM KNOWING THAT SOMEONE ELSE HAS GONE THROUGH IT AND OTHER PEOPLE GO THROUGH IT, SO THEY DON'T FEEL SO ISOLATED AND ALONE.  Please, you guys, check out lucidlove.org.  We'll also have that petition up with your blog and Nick Diaz.  And your story, just absolutely, you are changing lives.
It's not done yet.
No, it's not.  No, it's not.  We're rooting for you.  It is just beginning.  We can't wait to have you back on the show as heavyweight champion of the world.
Yeah, we're standing here first.
And we'll see you guys all next time on Pop Trigger.
